    • Method Detail

      • getOrderList

        java.util.List<Order> getOrderList()
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Read all information about orders from database and forms it into the collection list.
        Returns:
        a list contained all orders information.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • orderConfirm

        boolean orderConfirm(Order order)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used to add a new order information to the database.
        Parameters:
        order - contains a all information about order there are client info, taxi driver info, source, destiny and order price;
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • changeOrderStatus

        boolean changeOrderStatus(java.lang.String orderAction,
                          int orderId)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used to change an order status from database. In the dependence on the status we want to put in the database used a different prepared statement query.
        Parameters:
        orderAction - the action we want to apply in method.
        orderId - used to identify an order we want to change.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.

      • deleteObsoleteOrders

        boolean deleteObsoleteOrders()
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete all the information about orders from database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there are problems with database connection.
